ext_descriptions.ext_description: A predefined_geometric_status lists the possible values of the geometric status.
specifies that the geometric status has not been defined previously.
specifies that the geometric status is a standard datum condition.
specifies that the geometric status is perpendicular to the primary datum axis.
specifies that the geometric status is perpendicular to the primary datum plane.

ext_description.p:
An Altered_package is a type of . An Altered_package describes a
that has been modified in some manner from a reference . The material or shape properties of the Altered_package are different from the reference .
ext_description.example: Examples of alteration include trimming of the terminals, prebending of the terminals, tinning of the terminals for solderability, or more than one of these.

Figure 1 illustrates some of the different forms a Package may take when it is installed into an assembly. The original form on the left is in the role of package_to_be_altered for the forms on the right. The altered forms are identified and tracked by an enterprise.
ext_description.note: Most Altered_packages are a result of terminal alteration.

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
specifies the
that is a reference for the Altered_package.

ext_description.p:
specifies the
for the Altered_package. The value of the attribute need not be specified.

specifies the
of the package.
is to be interpreted as the geometric status is not available.
is to be interpreted as the primary orientation feature orientation is unmodified from that in the package_to_be_altered.
is to be interpreted as stating that the primary datum axis is perpendicular to that in the package_to_be_altered.
is to be interpreted as stating that the primary datum plane is perpendicular to that in the package_to_be_altered. The value of this attribute need not be specified.

specifies an inverse relationship that specifies that the existence of the Altered_package is dependent on the existence of the
that specifies the Altered_package as its .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The of_geometric_status or of_external_geometric_status shall be provided, but not both.

ext_description.p: An Altered_package_terminal is a type of . An Altered_package_terminal is one or more of a , a , or a . An Altered_package_terminal describes a that is the result of a modification process. Material or shape properties are different from the reference terminal.
ext_description.example: The modification process may be performed prior to installing the occurrence of the onto a Printed circuit board.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: specifies the role of the for the Altered_package_terminal.
specifies the that will be modified for the Altered_package_terminal.

A Length_trimmed_terminal is a type of . A Length_trimmed_terminal describes the prepared length of a terminal accomplished prior to its assembly to the printed circuit assembly. The prepared length is equivalent to the as-delivered length.

specifies the role of the
for the shortest finished length of the Length_trimmed_terminal.

The trimmed_length shall be , or it shall be , or it shall have only
in .

If trimmed_length is of type , then there shall be exactly one
in its .

If trimmed_length is of type
then there shall be one item in the member of trimmed_length. that is a .
A Surface_prepped_terminal is a type of that defines a modification to its surface condition, for solderability or other reasons, prior to its installation on an during the assembly of a .
specifies the for modification to the surface finish of the Surface_prepped_terminal.
A Shape_formed_terminal is a type of a that defines a modification of its shape from its original shape. This shape modification is done in order to facilitate the installation of a in an assembly.
